org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.misc

Class Printer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBlade
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.misc.Printer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade

    public class Printer
extends IsolationBlade
    An isolation bladefor printing. By using an isolation blade, printing is done on a different thread, along with formatting. In effect, Printer implements a simple logger.

    Sample Usage:

     public class PrinterSample {

     public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

         //A facility with one thread.
         final Facility facility = new Facility(1);

         try {

             //Print something.
             Printer.printlnAReq(facility, "Hello World!").call();

         } finally {
             //shutdown the facility
             facility.close();
         }

     }
 }
